data.message:
Could you please change the new design of the profile pictures back to as it was before? I don't want to crop the half of them, I want them to be uploaded in their initial dimensions... I have seen that many of the users complain about that. 
Thank you in advance for reading this.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Daniela! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
